nodes.label: CEO
nodes.description: Chief Executive Officer — overall company strategy and leadership. Reports to the Board of Directors. Contact via executive assistant for escalations.

nodes.label: CTO
nodes.description: Chief Technology Officer — technology vision and engineering leadership. Oversees Engineering and IT Support departments. Contact for technology strategy decisions.

nodes.label: COO
nodes.description: Chief Operations Officer — oversees day-to-day operational processes and the Operations department including Customer Support.

nodes.label: CFO
nodes.description: Chief Finance Officer — oversees financial planning, reporting, and the Finance department. Contact for budget approvals and financial queries.

nodes.label: Engineering
nodes.description: Engineering department under the CTO. Contains Backend, Frontend, and DevOps teams. Responsible for all software development and infrastructure.

nodes.label: IT Support
nodes.description: IT Support department under the CTO. Manages internal IT infrastructure, hardware provisioning, and employee technical support.

nodes.label: Operations
nodes.description: Operations department under the COO. Manages the Customer Support Team and operational processes. Contact: COO for escalations.

nodes.label: Finance
nodes.description: Finance department under the CFO. Manages budgeting, payroll, financial reporting, and the Financial System Upgrade project.

nodes.label: Backend Team
nodes.description: Team Lead: Alice Reyes (alice.reyes@company.com). 6 members. Responsible for developing and maintaining backend services and APIs. Currently running the Microservices Migration project (P-001, $150K budget).

nodes.label: Frontend Team
nodes.description: Team Lead: Mark Santos (mark.santos@company.com). 5 members. Develops all user interfaces and web products. Currently leading the Customer Portal Revamp project (P-002, $80K budget).

nodes.label: DevOps Team
nodes.description: Team Lead: John Cruz (john.cruz@company.com). 4 members. Manages CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and Kubernetes. Running Infrastructure Automation project (P-003, $120K budget).

nodes.label: Customer Support Team
nodes.description: Team Lead: Liza Gomez (liza.gomez@company.com). 8 members. Handles customer inquiries, issues, and the Customer Experience Program (P-004, completed).

nodes.label: Finance Team
nodes.description: Team Lead: Robert Tan (robert.tan@company.com). 3 members. Manages payroll, financial reporting, and the Financial System Upgrade (P-005, $90K budget).

nodes.label: Alice Reyes — Backend Lead
nodes.description: Employee ID: 1001. Role: Backend Lead. Full-time. Contact: alice.reyes@company.com. Contact for: backend API issues, Microservices Migration project, backend developer questions.

nodes.label: Mark Santos — Frontend Lead
nodes.description: Employee ID: 1002. Role: Frontend Lead. Full-time. Contact: mark.santos@company.com. Contact for: UI/UX issues, Customer Portal Revamp project, frontend developer questions.

nodes.label: John Cruz — DevOps Lead
nodes.description: Employee ID: 1003. Role: DevOps Lead. Full-time. Contact: john.cruz@company.com. Contact for: deployment issues, CI/CD pipeline, infrastructure and cloud resources.

nodes.label: Liza Gomez — Support Lead
nodes.description: Employee ID: 1004. Role: Support Lead. Full-time. Contact: liza.gomez@company.com. Contact for: customer complaints, support escalations, Customer Experience Program.

nodes.label: Robert Tan — Finance Manager
nodes.description: Employee ID: 1005. Role: Finance Manager. Full-time. Contact: robert.tan@company.com. Contact for: budget requests, expense reports, payroll queries, Financial System Upgrade.
